name: entrance
long_desc: You stand at the entrance of the Radical Town Training Yard. Best as you can tell, it seems like it's just junkyard that has had signs painted all over it. A stack of tires reads, 'The Aggrocragg'.

name: field
long_desc: You're in an open field within the training yard. There are strategically placed pits full of Lego bricks that are presumably meant to serve as hazards.
